message.content:
Then he got an idea. An awful idea. The Grinch got a wonderful, awful idea.

"I know just what to do!" the Grinch laughed in his throat,
And he made a quick Santy Claus hat and a coat.
And he chuckled and clucked, "What a great Grinchy trick!
With this coat and this hat, I'll look just like Saint Nick!

"All I need is a reindeer," the Grinch looked around.
But since reindeer are scarce, there was none to be found.
Did that stop old Grinch? No! The Grinch simply said,
"If I can't find a reindeer, I'll make one instead!"

So he called his dog Max. Then he took some red thread,
And tied big horn on top of poor Max's head.

Then the two loaded up bags full of ponderous presents
In their corrupt ruse to create false merriments

They rode toward Whoville with suspicious glee
With hopes all those Whovilles would look upon see!

"Pooh-pooh to the Whos!"' He was grinch-ish-ly humming:
"They're finding out now that no Christmas is coming!
"They're just waking up! Their mouths will hang open for',
"And then the small denizens down in Who-town
Will all cry boo-hoo!

"That's right," sneered tliat meanest of meaniesâ€”The GRINCH!' 
"Now let's ride from our mountain-top hidjiiway hutch!"
Likewise paraphras'd: we go soon as we finish .This punch!"

"We must time things correctly!" That G-r-i-n-c-h purred "
